Text.Language: Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ nao#c# n~io] n~a~poctoloc: peniwt Petroc nem pencaq Pauloc: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, O my lords and fathers the Apostles, our father Peter and our teacher Paul, that He may forgive us our sins.
اطلبا من الرب عنا ياسيدى الآباء الرسل أبانا بطرس ومعلمنا بولس ليغفر لنا خطايانا.
